official_title: To designate the United States Courthouse for the Eastern District of Virginia in Alexandria, Virginia, as the "Albert V. Bryan United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the United States Courthouse for the Eastern District of Virginia, located at Courthouse Square South and Jamieson Avenue in Alexandria, Virginia, as the Albert V. Bryan United States Courthouse. Provides that the Federal building located at 200 South Washington Street in Alexandria, Virginia, shall no longer be so designated.

titles.title: To designate the United States Courthouse for the Eastern District of Virginia in Alexandria, Virginia, as the "Albert V. Bryan United States Courthouse".
